ghostPost.title: DSNP Update: November 2021
ghostPost.excerpt:
A belated update! 

In November, our contributors continued the chain selection process and
completed other updates. As always, we invite you to add your comments and
questions to the discussions at forums.projectliberty.io 1
[https://forums.projectliberty.io/].

November DSNP update - Summary of progress

 * We are working on separating out the Activity Content portion of the SDK into
   its own package for easier upgrading and use. GitHub -
   LibertyDSNP/activity-content 3
   [https://github.
ghostPost.plaintext:
A belated update! 

In November, our contributors continued the chain selection process and
completed other updates. As always, we invite you to add your comments and
questions to the discussions at forums.projectliberty.io 1
[https://forums.projectliberty.io/].

November DSNP update - Summary of progress

 * We are working on separating out the Activity Content portion of the SDK into
   its own package for easier upgrading and use. GitHub -
   LibertyDSNP/activity-content 3
   [https://github.com/LibertyDSNP/activity-content]
 * We’ve been working to complete the conversion of Parquetjs to TypeScript
   which will allow easy export of the types for that package (not to mention
   type safety). GitHub - LibertyDSNP/parquetjs: Fully asynchronous, pure
   JavaScript implementation of the Parquet file format with additional features
   [https://github.com/LibertyDSNP/parquetjs]
 * We now have a public board tracking issues across the different project
   repositories. DSNP Project · GitHub
   [https://github.com/orgs/LibertyDSNP/projects/1]

Upcoming

 * We’ve been so busy looking at all the different blockchains, that we haven’t
   had time to write up the details. Look for a belated update soon!
ghostPost.html:
A belated update!

In November, our contributors continued the chain selection process and completed other updates. As always, we invite you to add your comments and questions to the discussions at forums.projectliberty.io 1.

November DSNP update - Summary of progress

  • We are working on separating out the Activity Content portion of the SDK into its own package for easier upgrading and use. GitHub - LibertyDSNP/activity-content 3
  • We’ve been working to complete the conversion of Parquetjs to TypeScript which will allow easy export of the types for that package (not to mention type safety). GitHub - LibertyDSNP/parquetjs: Fully asynchronous, pure JavaScript implementation of the Parquet file format with additional features
  • We now have a public board tracking issues across the different project repositories. DSNP Project · GitHub

Upcoming

  • We’ve been so busy looking at all the different blockchains, that we haven’t had time to write up the details. Look for a belated update soon!
